Content:
Rogue also has some more features that are blockchain based, Your avatar is a token, multiple sell-able accounts which can be used for winning multiplayer, and your in game gold is exchanged for a real currency ( getting paid to play)   

I think maybe we will find some good ideas as the game devlops more, I feel like we will need to add features to it.
